--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron landed near the Obylisk. He turned back. "Bewared of 
treachery
> Blindchaos, and not just mine." he warned.

::BLINDCHAOS::

   The Decepticon triplechanger smiled one of his loyal grins and 
winked.
   "Whatever ya say boss." he said, transforming into his Ankylosaur 
mode. He readied his blasters at his side. "If anyone dares go at ya, 
I'm ready for 'em!!"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
